title: Lack of proof of ownership as a violation
context: ยง145-23 Lack of proof of ownership as a violation. The failure of any person who sells, transports, or possesses after sale or transport, agricultural commodities to maintain a certificate of ownership or other written proof of ownership of the agricultural commodity, as described in section 145-22, is a violation of this part and also prima facie evidence of an offense under section 708-831(1)(e). [L 1999, c 186, pt of ยง2; am L 2003, c 20, ยง3; am L 2012, c 125, ยง3]
